rules.name: Minimum 3 ideas
rules.description: ideas.md must contain at least 3 distinct ideas

rules.name: Ideas are detailed
rules.description: Each idea must have description and key features

rules.name: Model outputs exist
rules.description: Both Gemini and Claude model outputs must exist

rules.name: Synthesis complete
rules.description: Final ideas.md must be synthesized from model outputs

rules.name: Ideas are feasible
rules.description: Ideas should not contain obvious technical impossibilities
